browser_testing.notes: CSS reviewed for cross-browser compatibility. All features use graceful degradation: text-wrap:balance (Chrome/Firefox/Edge only, Safari gets normal wrap), :focus-visible (Safari 15.4+, older gets standard focus), scroll-behavior:smooth (graceful fallback). System font stack ensures typography works everywhere. No polyfills needed.

mobile_testing.description: Test on iOS and Android devices
mobile_testing.notes: Mobile audit completed. Added min-height: 44px to nav links, buttons, contact links, and map links for proper touch targets. Added overscroll-behavior-y: contain to prevent accidental pull-to-refresh. Added -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent to remove iOS tap flash. Responsive breakpoints verified at 30rem, 48rem, and 64rem. Phone/email links use proper tel: and mailto: protocols. No horizontal scroll issues - all widths use relative units.
